app_name: X Launcher for Phone X Max - OS 12 Theme Launcher
app_detail:
Are you looking for launcher apps or themes apps? The phone launcher - X Launcher, your best choice!

X Launcher is the most beautiful launcher available for your android device. Itâ€™s an OS launcher which provides you the latest phone X launcher experience: simple, elegant, modern, yet powerful!

X launcher brings the best features of retinal Launcher and Android Pie to your device, then adds a wealth of colorful, customized and unique features so you can quickly and easily make your home screen shine! The phone launcher is one of OS launchers which provide various beautiful themes.

Standout features include:
Control Center OS 12
Make your phone look the same as a Phone X! Within X Launcher, there is an OS 12 control center will always running! 

Personalize HD Wallpapers & Themes all in X Launcher!
Come and make your own fashion phone in a new way! Super cool wallpapers and awesome themes in X Launcher, customize home screen with unique launcher theme wallpaper. 

- Wallpapers: Thousands of well-selected live wallpapers and home-screen theme wallpapers in many categories.

- Themes: Selected stylish themes for Android users for free which were designed by our designers. In the build-in wallpaper widget includes categories such as nature, cars, animals, sports, lifestyle, food & beverage, game, abstract and more are available with regular updates. 

Phone X Notch
Try the most popular Notch over the world, essentially just a screen is so wonderfully futuristic. Use X launcher is like have a Phone X in your hand, with the notch, your device has one extremely important advantage over most other smart phones: It's different. 

Real-time and Local Weather
Know the weather of your city conveniently. The real-time weather is displayed on the desktop. You can see the weather. Of course you can switch the city and widget position, it is very convenience!

Manage Home Screen: 
- Screen Manager & Smart Folder: Easy to organize your home screen, and adds more screens with your own designed gesture
- Widgets: Easily enter into system and launcher tools

Quikbar: Accessed APPs
Your frequently accessed App can be found quickly. You can open all apps through the drop-down, which will show your recently used apps, or you can customize the search bar with shortcuts and apps of your choosing.

Experience more with prime version: 
ğŸŒ…ğŸŒ… Weather Forecast
Displayed the next week on the desktop, you can see the Weather information you need inadvertently

ğŸ”§ğŸ”§ Customize Your Control Center
Music Play: Set your favorite music Player.
Strong Compliant Performance: When you in the game or open other app, you can always set up the control panel to set WIFI, Bluetooth, brightness, volume, camera, flashlight and so on. Itâ€™s easy to organize your screens alive.

ğŸ””ğŸ”” Icon badges 
For the unread message, the lovely icon badges will show numbers of unanswered phone calls, unread messages for all apps. Turn on the icon badges tips in the settings, you can open your Facebook, Twitter and other social software notification, none of this information will be missed! You can get an excellent experience in the notification system of X Launcher.

ğŸ”ğŸ” Hide Apps
Hide important apps from home screen. Itâ€™s a very sophisticated approach to open and hide your apps. Only two fingers can enlarge gestures to open this features. In addition, you can set your own password as the access key. We can assure that your app is hidden in here safely!

Dynamic effects for assistive touch, 3D touch and more useful tools can be seen in the near future! Stay tuned! If you are a fan of launcher apps, try one of the best launcher theme for android phone! The best launcher with lots of 3d themes is waiting for you!

If you like X launcher, please rate it on Google Play. We will continue to devote our best efforts to offer more excellent functions and themes for you! Thank you!
